Venom Marvel Comics character Wikipedia Venom Marvel Comics character From Wikipedia free encyclopedia Jump navigation Jump search Marvel Comics character This article about Venom symbiote character hosts Venom see Peter Parker Eddie Brock Anne Weying Mac Gargan Flash Thompson Venom Venom in promotional material Web Venom January Art by Clayton Crain Publication information Publisher Marvel Comics First appearance As Alien Costume Amazing Spider Man May As Venom Cameo appearance Amazing Spider Man April Full appearance Amazing Spider Man May Created by Alien Costume Randy Schueller Roger Stern Tom DeFalco Mike Zeck Ron Frenz Venom David Michelinie Todd McFarlane In story information Alter ego Various hosts Species Symbiote Place origin Gorr s unnamed planet Team affiliations Sinister Six Dark Avengers Project Rebirth Thunderbolts Secret Avengers Guardians Galaxy New Warriors S H E L D Agents Cosmos Venom Army X Men Blue Symbiote Imperium Kree Empire Savage Avengers Notable aliases Spider Man Black Suit Alien Costume Other She Venom Sinister Spider Man Agent Venom Superior Venom Venom Spaceknight Spider s Black Spirit Svartalfvenom Abilities All powers symbiote s first human host Spider Man Limited shapeshifting camouflage Symbiote s autonomous defense capabilities Undetectable by Spider Man s Spider sense Venom fictional character appearing in American comic books published by Marvel Comics commonly in association with Spider Man character sentient alien Symbiote with an amorphous liquid like form survives by bonding with host usually human This dual life form receives enhanced powers usually refers itself as Venom Symbiote was originally introduced as living alien costume in Amazing Spider Man May with full first appearance as Venom in Amazing Spider Man May Venom Symbiote s first human host was Spider Man eventually discovered its true nefarious nature separated himself from creature in Amazing Spider Man November with brief rejoining five months later in Web Spider Man Symbiote went on merge with other hosts most notably Eddie Brock its second most infamous host with whom it first became Venom one Spider Man s archenemies Contents Conception creation Hosts Spider Man Peter Parker Eddie Brock Scorpion Mac Gargan Flash Thompson Lee Price Tel Kar Malekith Other hosts Scarlet Spider Ben Reilly Anne Weying Patricia Robertson Angelo Fortunato Kulan Gath Ms Marvel Carol Danvers Red Hulk Thunder Bolt Ross Superior Spider Man Otto Octavius Groot Rocket Racoon Drax Mercurio D Man Mysterio Quentin Beck Powers abilities Other versions In other media Television Film Spider Man trilogy Amazing Spider Man series Sony s Marvel Universe Video games Reception See also References External links Conception creation original idea new costume Spider Man that would later become character Venom was conceived by Marvel Comics reader from Norridge Illinois named Randy Schueller In Jim Shooter Marvel s editor in chief at time sent Schueller letter acknowledging Marvel s interest in idea which they ended up purchasing from him Shooter came up with idea switching Spider Man black white costume possibly influenced by intended costume design new Spider Woman artist Mike Zeck designed it Writer artist John Byrne says on his website that he conceived costume self healing biological material he was artist on Iron Fist explain that character s costume was constantly being torn then apparently repaired by next issue Byrne says explaining that he ended up not using idea on that title but that Roger Stern later asked him if he could use idea Spider Man s alien costume Stern in turn plotted issue in which costume first appeared but then left title It was writer Tom DeFalco artist Ron Frenz established that costume was sentient alien being that was vulnerable high sonic energy during run on Amazing Spider Man that preceded Michelinie s Symbiote was first introduced as Spider man s new black costume in Amazing Spider Man May as part story called Homecoming story takes place after Spider Man s return from events miniseries Secret Wars he first obtains black costume full first appearance Venom in Amazing Spider Man May after Symbiote bonds with Eddie Brock Hosts Spider Man Peter Parker Main article Spider Man Venom Symbiote bonds Spider Man in Secret Wars Art by Mike Zeck story Spider Man gets his new black costume recounted in Marvel Super Heroes Secret Wars December in which writer Jim Shooter artist Mike Zeck depicted heroes villains Marvel Universe transported another planet called Battleworld by being called Beyonder After Spider Man s costume ruined from battles with villains he directed by Thor Hulk room at heroes base they inform him machine can read his thoughts instantly fabricate any type clothing Choosing machine he believes be correct one Spider Man causes black sphere appear before him which spreads over his body dissolving tattered old costume covering his body form new black white costume Spider Man s surprise costume can mimic street clothes provides seemingly inexhaustible stronger supply webbing During run on Amazing Spider Man writer Tom DeFalco artist Ron Frenz established that costume was sentient alien Symbiote that was vulnerable both fire high sonic energy It was in that storyline that costume would envelop Peter Parker while he slept go out at night fight crime leaving Parker inexplicably exhausted in morning Parker had costume examined by Reed Richards discovered that it was alive Parker realized it was trying permanently bond Parker s body he rejected it it was subsequently contained by Fantastic Four Symbiote escaped bonded again Parker used sound waves from cathedral s church bell repel it But symbiote had grown an emotional attachment Peter so he willingly left Peter s unconscious body moved him safety before disappearing In Go Down Swinging Norman Osborn got bonded Carnage symbiote Spider Man rebonds symbiote in an attempt stop Osborn now calling himself Red Goblin while forgiving both Eddie Venom past conflicts He with symbiote got new costume design they were overpowering Osborn until Norman mortally injured Flash Thompson This caused Spider Man symbiote get angry eventually losing control until Flash calmed them down with his dying breath In final battle Spider Man tells symbiote leave him that he himself going be all right while Norman also detaches himself from Carnage Eddie Brock Main article Eddie Brock David Michelinie would later write backstory Eddie Brock as alien s new host that would become villain Venom using events Peter David s Sin Eater storyline in Spectacular Spider Man as basis Brock s origin Venom s existence was first indicated in Web Spider Man September he shoved Peter Parker in front subway train without Parker s spider sense warning him though only Brock s hand was seen on panel next indication Venom s existence was in Web Spider Man March Parker climbed out high story window change into Spider Man but found black arm coming through window grabbing him again without being warned by his spider sense After appearing in shadow in Amazing Spider Man March Venom made his cameo appearance on last page Amazing Spider Man April he terrorized Parker s wife Mary Jane Watson made his full appearance in Amazing Spider Man May Spider Man would confront him in following issue Brock reveals that he was Daily Globe reporter worked on Sin Eater case that his career was ruined it was discovered that man Brock announced as Sin Eater was compulsive confessor Forced eke out living writing lurid stories venomous tabloids Brock blamed Spider Man his predicament He took up bodybuilding reduce stress It failed do so Brock sank into suicidal depression Seeking solace at church Spider Man repelled Symbiote Symbiote sensing Brock s hatred Spider Man bonded with disgraced reporter Brock took on name Venom in reference sensationalistic material he was forced traffic in following his fall from grace Over years as Symbiote gained more intelligence moved additional human hosts name began apply Symbiote as well as its hosts As Venom Brock fights Spider Man many times winning on several occasions Venom repeatedly tries kill Peter Parker Spider Man both latter was in out costume Thus Parker forced abandon his black costume which Symbiote had been mimicking after Venom confronts Parker s wife Mary Jane Venom escapes from supervillain prison Vault torment Spider Man his family Symbiote finally rendered comatose after being subdued by Styx s plague virus Eddie Brock subsequently placed in Ryker s Island Prison Symbiote recovers returns free Brock it leaves spawn bond with Brock s psychotic serial killer cellmate Cletus Kasady becomes Carnage Meanwhile Venom Spider Man fight on deserted island Spider Man strands Venom after faking his own death Soon after however Spider Man brings Venom back New York City in order stop Carnage s killing spree After being incarcerated once again Venom used create five new Symbiotes which are all paired with human hosts Eddie Brock returns as Venom in continuation volume one in his eponymous series Art from Venom February by Javier Garron As well as helping Eddie Brock seek continued revenge against Spider Man Symbiote also aids Brock in sporadic career as vigilante He Symbiote occasionally share desire protect innocent people from harm even if it means working side by side with hated Spider Man This especially true Venom combats entity he believes be his spawn Carnage Spider Man helps Venom save Brock s ex wife Anne Weying two form temporary truce though this falls apart after Weying s suicide Symbiote temporarily stolen by U S Senator Steward Ward hopes better understand his own alien infection by researching Symbiote before it returns Brock Now however it dominates its host Brock rather than vice versa Eventually Eddie Brock Symbiote go separate ways as Symbiote grows tired having diseased host Eddie rejects its growing bloodlust leading him sell Symbiote at super villain auction creature that would become Venom was born in th generation race extraterrestrial Symbiotes which lived by possessing bodies other life forms parasites would endow victims with enhanced physical abilities at cost fatally draining them adrenaline volume issue needed According Planet Symbiotes storyline Venom Symbiote after separated from its first host was deemed insane by its own race after it was discovered that it desired commit its host rather than use it up Symbiote was then imprisoned on Battleworld ensure it did not pollute species gene pool volume issue needed symbiote bonds with its new host Lee Price launching volume Venom comic book series series ran six issues total Nov April Eddie Brock able regain Venom symbiote at conclusion series returning Venom comic book title volume with issue Scorpion Mac Gargan Main article Mac Gargan Venom Symbiote approaches Mac Gargan villain formerly known as Scorpion offered him new abilities as second Venom Gargan bonded with creature which would later give him an extra edge as part Norman Osborn s Sinister Twelve As Avengers dealt with rest Twelve Spider Man swiftly defeated Gargan even with these additional powers which Spider Man suggests attributed fact that Mac Gargan does not hate Spider Man as much as Eddie Brock did Mac Gargan as fourth host second Venom Gargan later became member sub group Thunderbolts which was drafted by Avengers hunt down members fugitive New Avengers It was then revealed that he had been outfitted with electrical implants by government keep Symbiote in check in Venom persona Gargan retained very little his original personality was controlled almost completely by Symbiote which drove him cannibalism Symbiote was dormant in his body he expressed nausea fear organism During fight with Anti Venom Eddie Brock he his Symbiote were separated Venom Symbiote was nearly destroyed Blobs it still existed in his bloodstream however so Osborn injected Gargan with vaccine Anti Venom s healing powers which restored Symbiote by causing remaining pieces it expand rapidly Gargan dons Scorpion battle armor over Symbiote while it heals causing him become Spider Man calls Ven orpion although Symbiote fully restored it shatters armor volume issue needed After ingesting chemical given him by Norman Osborn Venom transforms into more human appearance similar Black Suited Spider Man Osborn introduces him as Amazing Spider Man member Dark Avengers while unveiling team After Siege Asgard Gargan most Dark Avengers were taken into custody While being held on Raft Venom Symbiote was forcefully removed from him ending his run as Venom Flash Thompson Main article Flash Thompson On December Marvel Comics announced new black ops Venom owned by government This new Venom was featured in new series called Venom in March birth new Venom can be seen in Amazing Spider Man in February On January identity black ops Venom was revealed be Flash Thompson Flash hired by government be special agent wearing Venom Symbiote as part Project Rebirth Flash only allowed wear suit up hours risk permanent bonding with Symbiote Along with alien Flash equipped with Multi Gun designed change into any type gun Flash needs Government also equipped with kill switch designed take Flash out if he loses control Flash rejects kill switch later joins Secret Avengers Thunderbolts Guardians Galaxy even becomes appointed by Klyntar Space Knight Lee Price Lee Price first appeared in Venom Vol dying in Spider Man Venom Free Comic Book Day After being separated from Flash Thompson through unspecified means Venom symbiote happens upon black market deal between Black Cat s gang Tombstone s gang He resorts bonding with one men present discharged Army Ranger named Lee Price was with Scorpion as part Black Cat s gang weakened symbiote pleads with Price attempting convince him become hero like Thompson Price ignores overpowers it intent on using it personal gain as new wholly villainous Venom Lee Price makes his way Black Cat s hideout Scorpion accuses him botching black market sale by causing shoot out After having keep Venom symbiote from attacking Black Cat Lee Price takes his leave from Black Cat s lair as Scorpion gets suspicious towards Lee His departure seen by some FBI Agents Lee Price later gets attacked by Tombstone s minion Firebug Upon defeating Firebug an FBI Agent with bazooka appears telling Lee Price that he under arrest Lee Price eventually loses symbiote Eddie Brock Spider Man take him down he arrested by NYPD While incarcerated at New York Corrections Supermax Facility Superhuman Incarceration Lee Price feared by most inmates he even defeats three inmates in prison s cafeteria they try kill him boost reputation Lee swears get out reclaim Venom symbiote plan revenge on those have wronged him Lee Price later visited by his lawyer tells him that two inmates he defeated had died in infirmary that Venom has resurfaced upon it being revealed in news At courthouse Lee Price s lawyer stated that Lee s actions as Venom were caused by Venom symbiote while opposing lawyer mentions about Venom still being at large judge then asked some evidence help with trial After trial Lee Price released from prison begins his plans reclaim Venom symbiote take revenge on those have wronged him In Venom Inc Lee Price steals Mania symbiote from Andy becomes Maniac He uses symbiote infect crime bosses become criminal kingpin but he defeated by Spider Man Venom Black Cat Agent Anti Venom Cletus Kasady was collecting codex left in bodies previous hosts he disguised himself as Eddie went jail he killed Lee after ripping Maniac symbiote off him while framing Eddie murder Tel Kar Tel Kar first appeared in Venom First Host During Kree Skrull War Kree desiring replicate Skrull s shape shifting abilities they obtain newborn Venom which had been outcast from other symbiotes on Gorr s planet Knull had created symbiotes Tel Kar recruited be bonded newborn symbiote in order infiltrate Skrull army Tel Kar s body biologically altered so he can have full control over symbiote s mind point erasing its memories He successfully infiltrated Skrull army discovering various secrets However he blew his cover up in order save some Kree refugees handed symbiote them return it Hala Then Tel Kar was betrayed by Ronan Accuser used Kree Sentry capture Tel Kar was given Skrulls as war criminal Separated from Tel Kar after his capture symbiote goes on be bonded Spider Man Tel Kar escapes Skrulls wanders through Galaxy thinking that War still going on until he hears an agent from Earth called Flash Thompson with black symbiote suit Recognizing it as his symbiote he goes Earth find it Eddie Brock arrives with symbiote saves Tel Kar from Warbride Skrull M Lanz had followed him Angered by Venom s refusal return him Tel Kar threatens bond Venom s latest offspring turn it into monster Acceding Tel Kar Venom reunites with him they go Skrull research base get Skrull bioweapon Simultaneously Eddie bonded offspring calling itself Sleeper allies with M Lanz stop Tel Kar During ensuing battle Tel Kar concludes that he doesn t need Venom anymore uses an electrified spear detach himself from it while scarring himself in process Later he betrayed by Kree Empire while Eddie escapes with Venom M Lanz with Sleeper Tel Kar now furious attempts release bioweapon on Earth kill all humanity but Sleeper bonds Tel Kar lobotomizes him as punishment he did Venom Eddie Sleeper now with Tel Kar s body wishes Eddie farewell goes on explore universe Malekith Main article Malekith Accursed During War Realms event after Venom was separated from Eddie symbiote in its humanoid form joined War Avengers composed Captain Marvel Deadpool Lady Sif Winter Soldier Weapon H Black Widow Captain Britain fight off Malekith s invasion However upon fighting Malekith Dark Elf with use Ebony Blade teleported away along with Venom Since Malekith was aware Knull Gorr s All Black Necrosword he tortured symbiote turned it into his own weapon similar All Black in order use it against Asgardians During end event Malekith enhanced symbiote with his dark magic bonded symbiote his various acolytes turning them into Spider Elves After Thor Corps arrived which consisted Thor King Thor Young Odinson Jane Foster Malekith using Venom Blade Symbio Sword covered one Thor s hammers with symbiote declared himself Butcher Thor However he was defeated symbiote was ultimately free from Malekith s control Other hosts have been other shorter term hosts symbiote Scarlet Spider Ben Reilly Main article Ben Reilly In Planet Symbiotes storyline symbiote was rejected by Eddie causing it release powerful scream that attracts other symbiotes Earth Subsequently symbiote sees Scarlet Spider Ben Reilly takes form his hooded top attempting bond Ben mistaking him Spider Man but failed owing Ben s strong will it was later discovered by Brock Peter Parker symbiote returned Eddie Anne Weying Main article Anne Weying Anne Weying as She Venom Art by Greg Luzniak Anne Weying first appears in Amazing Spider Man She Eddie Brock s ex wife successful lawyer Weying assists Spider Man by sharing some Brock s history Later she follows Spider Man amusement park Venom had Peter s fake parents She confronts Brock manages convince him end his feud After Sin Eater shoots Ann as part crusade against social injustice Ann becomes She Venom Venom Symbiote temporarily bonds with her save her life She Venom lashes out against men had hurt her Brock becomes afraid her her compels Symbiote return him Ann left distraught at her actions while bonded Later Ann arrested on false charge as part trap Venom She manages warn Brock sends Symbiote her allowing her become She Venom escape custody Some time later Ann traumatized by her experiences with Venom Symbiote commits suicide after seeing Spider Man pass by her window in black costume believing it Brock returning her Patricia Robertson Main article Patricia Robertson comics story follows U S Army communication specialist Patricia Robertson During supply run an Ararat Corporation owned outpost she discovers everyone at installation dead except one scientist It revealed that Ararat Corporation run by an alien colony miniature spider robots led by an entity named Bob that have infiltrated American government Ararat Corporation has cloned Venom facilitate extermination humanity but clone ravages its hosts clone responsible death outpost crew Robertson finds an ally in Suit mysterious individual made same miniature robots as Bob revealed have been accidentally brought Earth by Reed Richards Suit modifies Robertson while she unconscious allow her control clone if it bonds with her Suit sabotages Wolverine clones favored host forcing it bond with Robertson One Bob s agents convinces Robertston kill real Venom save humanity causing her free incarcerated Venom She Venom fight but Venom escapes Bob remotely deactivates technology allowing Robertson control clone forcing her rely on willpower Later Robertson Venom again fight Venom absorbs clone Venom decides carry out clone s mission given it by Ararat corporation series did not continue plot remained unresolved as Venom Symbiote would later regurgitate expel clone from its body allowing it bond with teenager named Andrea Andi Benton Taking name Mania Benton became Agent Venom s partner time Angelo Fortunato Angelo Fortunato first appeared in Marvel Knights Spider Man was killed in issue Angelo son Don Fortunato prominent Mafia capo His frail physique shy attitude leave Angelo frequently bullied humiliated by his father Don attends supervillain auction purchases Venom Symbiote from Brock million Brock warns Angelo Symbiote but Angelo rebuffs him saying that he has nothing lose After bonding with Symbiote Angelo discovers secret identity Spider Man attempts kill him prove his worth Spider Man ultimately defeats Angelo he tries escape Symbiote abandons Angelo his cowardice while he leaping between buildings leaving him fall his death Spider Man tried save him but he ran out webs Kulan Gath In Spider Man Red Sonja miniseries Spider Man Red Sonja possessing body Mary Jane fought evil wizard Kulan Gath had possessed U S senator Kulan detached symbiote from Eddie bonded it becoming Kulan Venom Luckily symbiote returned Eddie following defeat Kulan Ms Marvel Carol Danvers During Siege Mac Gargan with symbiote was fighting Spider Man Ms Marvel they separated Mac from Venom symbiote briefly bonded Carol started flying away But Carol gathered her powers detached from symbiote which rebonded Mac Red Hulk Thunder Bolt Ross During Circle Four storyline Red Hulk came crashing into Flash s apartment so he can recruit him symbiote sensing Red Hulk as danger briefly bonds him so he doesn t do any harm Flash Then Red Hulk calms down symbiote returns Flash During against Blackheart Hulk bonded again with symbiote along with Zarathos in order prevent Hell from coming Earth Superior Spider Man Otto Octavius Main article Doctor Octopus Flash Thompson with symbiote was infiltrating into Crime Master s men Superior Spider Man came attacking criminals was then confronted by Agent Venom Doc Ock thinking that Venom was still evil attacked Flash with Web Shooters filled with burner fuel in process injured Flash While Flash was recovering Superior Spider Man put symbiote in canister gave Flash pair prosthetic legs Then symbiote broke out instead bonding Flash it bonded Superior Spider Man since it was still connected Peter s body After bonding symbiote Otto called himself Superior Venom went solving crime in much more brutal way Then Mary Jane called Avengers stop Superior Venom But Avengers proved be no match Superior Venom since he had abilities Spider Man powered by Venom with mind Doctor Octopus combined In fight Otto realizes that symbiote was messing with his head with help Peter s consciousness Flash s had arrived in an Iron Man suit he separated himself from Venom which returned Flash Groot Rocket Racoon Drax Flash was part Guardians Galaxy he got separated from symbiote his team mates decided send him Earth While traveling Groot accidentally bonds symbiote started attacking others Then Rocket tried save his friend but symbiote left Groot bonded him Then he tried convince them leave his ship but Drax grabbed Rocket by tail started bashing him walls until symbiote bonded Drax defeated whole team Now symbiote possessed Drax took control ship went planet formed from symbiotes named Klyntar later revealed be Knull s cage symbiote got purified rebonded Flash Mercurio D Man Main article Mercurio D Man Agent Venom as Venom Space Knight foils Gramosian s attempts steal resources from home planets P qui Wugin acquire chemical weapons derived from blood kidnapped Vvexians Mercurio forces Ruu lto named Pik Rollo whose child he holding hostage try assassinate Agent Venom but Rollo instead betrays Mercurio joins forces with Venom two lay siege Mercurio s headquarters he incapacitates imprisons them separates Venom symbiote from Flash Thompson Sensing symbiote s suppressed bloodlust Mercurio attempts convince it join him but it instead frees returns Thompson reformed Agent Venom his allies proceed dismantle Mercurio s forces but Mercurio himself escapes swears vengeance on both symbiote Thompson bout temporary insanity that Venom symbiote subsequently experiences eventually discerned have been caused by its brief fusion with Mercurio whose evil had undone mental cleansing that creature had earlier undergone Mysterio Quentin Beck Main article Mysterio In mini series Symbiote Spider Man in which explored time Spider Man was still bonded symbiote Mysterio blackmailed Black Cat into stealing piece Spider Man s suit him he had his friend Jonathan Ohnn scientist Kingpin examine piece symbiote controlling Peter s body came retrieve it however after clashing with men Kingpin was unable find it fled Kingpin then had Mysterio tied up interrogation but severed piece bonded Mysterio which allowed him overpower Kingpin his men He then went after Spider Man in order steal suit use it himself Powers abilities Symbiote enhances physical strength its host Art from variant cover Venom vol November by Clayton Crain Though it requires living host in order survive Venom symbiote has been shown be adept at fending itself independent host Symbiote capable shapeshifting abilities including ability form spikes expand its size as well as mimic appearance other humanoids after it has obtained host organism can additionally use its shape shifting abilities conceal itself by altering its coloration by becoming completely invisible It also contains small dimensional aperture allowing its hosts carry items without adding mass costume Symbiote also exhibits telepathic abilities primarily it needs communicate with its host citation needed its contact with Spider Man Symbiote grants all its subsequent hosts that hero s powers cannot be detected by his spider sense As Spider Man s fighting style partly dependent on his spider sense his effectiveness was somewhat hampered he battled Eddie Brock Retaining its memory from time it was bonded with Spider Man Venom also capable producing webbing similar Spider Man s own variety created from itself Symbiote greatly enhances physical strength those it bonds with Its hosts experience vastly larger size musculature Symbiote displays non human teeth which are very sharp commonly protrudes long tongue from its mouth Venom depicted as being physically much bigger than Spider Man as well as having more brute strength Venom exhibits some immunities supernatural powers others such as Penance Stare Ghost Rider Spider Man s extrasensory spider sense Some incarnations Venom Symbiote have shown it able replicate itself This ability shown in miniseries Spider Man Reign Venom recreates his own Symbiote combat his loneliness Venom Symbiote vulnerable fire sonic waves causing it great pain exhaustion if it sustains enough exposure It can sense track all its offspring Symbiotes except Carnage learned block this ability shortly after bonding with Cletus Kasady confronting Venom Eddie Brock first time Venom symbiote shown form giant Web like dragon wings it was in contact with Knull Other versions Main article Alternative versions Venom As fictional character Venom has appeared in various adaptations from comic books films television series Each version work typically establishes its own continuity sometimes introduces parallel universes point distinct differences in portrayal character can be identified This article details various versions Venom depicted in works including Marvel Comics Ultimate universe If issues In other media Television Venom Eddie Brock in Spider Man Animated Series standing before Dr Ashley Kafka Venom appeared in Spider Man with Spider Man s version voiced by Christopher Daniel Barnes Eddie Brock s version voiced by Hank Azaria At end Alien Costume Part Two Brock becomes Venom after Spider Man rejects Symbiote At end Alien Costume Part Three Venom was defeated Venom s last appearance was in Season Three he teams up with Spider Man Iron Man against Carnage Dormammu Baron Mordo Eddie Brock incarnation Venom appears as major antagonist in Spider Man Unlimited voiced by Brian Drummond Like his partner in crime Carnage Venom gains ability change into somewhat liquid form They mutated into new more powerful forms prompting Spider Man create his new suit Venom s form featured spikes more muscular body also had an elastic stretching power instead webs Venom appears in Spectacular Spider Man with Spider Man s version voiced by Josh Keaton Eddie Brock s version voiced by Benjamin Diskin In episode Uncertainly Principle Symbiote arrives on Earth by stowing away on space shuttle After being rejected by Spider Man it bonds with Eddie in episode Intervention ultimately defeated in episode Nature vs Nurture Venom reappeared in Season Two episodes First Steps Growing Pains Identity Crisis he attempts expose Spider Man s secret identity but his plans are foiled Venom recurring character in Ultimate Spider Man with Harry Osborn voiced by Matt Lanter Goblin Venom voiced by Steven Weber In episode Venom Doctor Octopus creates Venom Symbiote from sample Spider Man s blood After it escapes from its creators it temporarily fuses with number characters Flash Thompson Nova Power Man Iron Fist finally Spider Man Harry bonds with organism in episode Back in Black gradually turning into villain Venom until Spider Man electrifies suit off him In episode Venomous Venom Symbiote takes control Harry again but Spider Man other heroes are able free him thanks an Anti Venom formula created by Doctor Octopus Symbiote later appears in episodes Carnage Venom Bomb Second Chance Avenging Spider Man Venom appears in summer animated special Phineas Ferb Mission Marvel voiced by Danny Trejo Venom appears in Hulk Agents S M S H episode Venom Inside Doctor Octopus creates new version Venom Symbiote that gradually assimilates Skaar She Hulk Red Hulk finally Hulk help dominate but also destroy Spider Man However Hulks Spider Man eventually manage defeat Venom Symbiote although it unknown if Venom Symbiote still alive Venom appears in Lego Marvel Super Heroes Maximum Overload voiced by Dee Bradley Baker Venom appears in Spider Man Venom Symbiote first appeared in episode Day in Life as V that was found by space program sent over Horizon High research Venom Symbiote appears in Avengers Assemble episode Immortal Weapon At time Beyonder formed Battleworld his experiment satellite that crashed into K un Lun contained vial holding Venom Symbiote that escaped found its way into Iron Fist had imprisoned Dracula Venom Symbiote binding Dracula enabled him survive in sunlight during one his fights with Black Panther Falcon Iron Fist was also mentioning by Dracula that far off domain on Battleworld filled with Symbiotes With help K un Lun Dragon defeating vampires Iron Fist used his iron fist move strike Dracula enough Symbiote break off him causing Dracula flee Venom Symbiote appears in Guardians Galaxy episode Drive Me Carnage sample it was held at Horizon High possessed Spider Man during Guardians Galaxy s fight with Carnage possessed Thanos Film Venom s first appearance in motion picture was originally planned titular film written by David S Goyer produced by New Line Cinema in which Venom would have been portrayed as an antihero Carnage as antagonist By film rights Venom had reverted Sony Pictures Spider Man trilogy Topher Grace as Eddie Brock Venom in Spider Man Eddie Brock Venom appears as main antagonist in feature film Spider Man played by Topher Grace In film Symbiote after being rejected by Peter Parker joins with Brock after rival freelance photographer exposed by Parker have used fake photograph which ruins him publicly Venom seeks an alliance with Flint Marko Sandman kill Spider Man but thwarted in his plans killed by one New Goblin s pumpkin bombs In July Sony executive Avi Arad revealed spin off Sam Raimi s Spider Man trilogy focused on Venom Symbiote was in planning stages with Jacob Aaron Estes commissioned write script tentatively entitled Venom In September Rhett Reese Paul Wernick signed on write film after Estes script was rejected while Gary Ross would direct Variety reported that Venom would become an anti hero in film Marvel Entertainment would produce film potential film was ultimately cancelled Amazing Spider Man series Venom Symbiote has cameo appearance at end feature film Amazing Spider Man in Oscorp building in scene which features Gustav Fiers Gentleman walking past many Oscorp s technology experiments including Vulture s wings mechanical arms Doctor Octopus In viral marketing campaign Amazing Spider Man an article by Eddie Brock one most notable hosts Venom detailing capture Cletus Cassidy later went on become Carnage was featured with Anne Weying in comics became Bride Venom being mentioned in another article these articles coming from fictional Marvel universe s Daily Bugle In March Josh Trank was in talks direct new Venom film as part Amazing Spider Man film series In December Sony officially announced two spin offs Amazing Spider Man film series involving Venom film now known as Venom Carnage Sinister Six respectively with first be written by Alex Kurtzman Roberto Orci Ed Solomon with Kurtzman directing it In September Kurtzman stated that they had been considering different incarnations character including Eddie Brock Anne Weying Flash Thompson movie among other spin offs were cancelled prior studios contract agreement with Marvel Studios Sony s Marvel Universe Main articles Venom film Venom Tom Hardy as Venom in film In March following introduction Spider Man Marvel Cinematic Universe it was announced that Sony was moving forward with standalone film by hiring Dante Harper write script Arad Matt Tolmach Amy Pascal producing film was initially reported have no connection Marvel Cinematic Universe nor have any relation Spider Man that it would be set in its own continuity year later Sony announced that Venom would be released on October with Scott Rosenberg Jeff Pinkner signed on as screenwriters It was reported be Rated R be first in series Spider Man character related spin off films called Sony s Marvel Universe In May Tom Hardy was announced be cast as Eddie Brock Venom with Ruben Fleischer attached direct Carlton Drake Riot appeared as film s primary antagonist as did Anne Weying Brock s ex wife from comics film has been described by film s director Ruben Fleischer be taking inspiration from works David Cronenberg John Carpenter supporting cast also consists Riz Ahmed Michelle Williams Jenny Slate Variety reported that Kelly Marcel would write script with Pinkner Rosenberg Filming officially began on October Venom was released in United States on October with PG rating Venom scheduled release in United States on October Video games Venom playable character boss character in number video games across several platforms Venom first appears as boss character in Mega CD Sega CD version Amazing Spider Man vs Kingpin in which he kidnaps Mary Jane Watson Venom both protagonist playable character in Spider Man Venom Maximum Carnage Daran Norris Venom Symbiote appears as an unlockable costume Spider Man in X Men Mutant Academy Ultimate Venom playable character in Ultimate Spider Man with Eddie Brock voiced by Daniel Capallaro Rise Imperfects voiced by Jason Bryden Eddie Brock incarnation Venom included in downloadable Villains Pack expansion Xbox version Marvel Ultimate Alliance voiced by Steven Blum Venom has his Classic Marvel Knights Thunderbolts Ultimate looks as alternate skins Venom costume also available as alternate attire Spider Man Eddie Brock incarnation Venom final boss in Spider Man voiced by Topher Grace Szarabajka During this game part his Symbiote leaves him bonds with Spider Man giving him access black suit again Venom works on reproducing Symbiote spreading them all over New York in an invasion appears as an optional costume Spider Man in Marvel vs Capcom Fate Two Worlds Ultimate Marvel vs Capcom Anti Venom also appears as card in Heroes Heralds mode Eddie Brock incarnation Venom appears in Spider Man virtual pinball game Pinball FX released by Zen Studios Eddie Brock incarnation Venom appears as villain character in Marvel Super Hero Squad Online voiced by Travis Willingham Black Suit Spidey costume also an alternate costume Spider Man Two versions black suit appear as an optional costume in Amazing Spider Man based on its appearance in Spider Man film modified version Spider Man s costume from film Amazing Spider Man Backstory game also reveals that game version Scorpion based on black goo recovered from space citation needed In Amazing Spider Man version Venom exists in secret Oscorp experiment run in Ravencroft called Venom Project using nanites as regenerating body armor with enhanced strength It can also be used infect other beings turning them feral Eddie Brock incarnation Venom appears as playable character in fighting game Marvel Avengers Battle Earth voiced by Roger Craig Smith In Marvel Heroes Eddie Brock incarnation Venom voiced by Neil Kaplan appears as villain character while Symbiote Spider Man voiced by Christopher Daniel Barnes appears as alternate costume Spider Man Venom appears as playable character in Lego Marvel Super Heroes voiced by Dave Boat Both classic ultimate incarnations Venom can be used Eddie Brock Also Black Suit an alternate costume Spider Man via downloadable content Venom appears as villain in mobile version game Amazing Spider Man Venom appears as playable character in Disney Infinity Marvel Super Heroes in Spider Man playset Venom playable character in Marvel Future Fight Mac Gargan Eddie Brock Flash Thompson incarnations Venom are playable characters in Marvel Puzzle Quest Numerous versions Venom appear as playable characters in Spider Man Unlimited Additionally Eddie Brock version Venom appeared as boss in Symbiote Dimensions event Later Agent Anti Venom Maniac Lee Price Inkling versions Black Cat Hammerhead Mac Gargan take part in new Venom Inc event Eddie Brock incarnation Venom appears as playable character in Marvel Avengers Academy voiced by Brian Stivale Venom appears as playable character via downloadable content in Marvel vs Capcom Infinite Eddie Brock Flash Thompson incarnations Venom are playable characters in Lego Marvel Super Heroes In Spider Man game black suited Spider Man collectible can be seen In post credit scene Harry Osborn seen bonded symbiote in Norman Osborn s secret lab Eddie Brock incarnation Venom appears as playable character sometimes level quest boss in Kabam Games mobile game Marvel Contest Champions game also includes Carnage three Venom derivative characters VenomPool mixture Venom Deadpool Venom Duck mixture Venom Howard Duck Symbiote Supreme mixture Venom Dr Strange Eddie Brock incarnation Venom appears as boss playable character in Marvel Ultimate Alliance Black Order once again voiced by Steven Blum Reception Comics journalist historian Mike Conroy writes character started out as replacement costume Spider Man turned into one Marvel web slinger s greatest nightmares Venom was ranked as nd Greatest Comic Book Villain All Time in IGN s list top comic villains IGN also ranked Mac Gargan s incarnation Venom as in list Top Avengers while Flash Thompson incarnation was ranked as character was listed as on Empire s Greatest Comic Book Characters was also ranked at in Marvel s Top Spider Verse Characters See also List Venom titles
